name: aberdeen
description: A TypeScript/JavaScript library for quickly building performant declarative user interfaces without the use of a virtual DOM nor any transpilation.

scripts.build: bun run build:dist && bun run build:docs
scripts.build:dist: rm -rf dist dist-min && bun build src/*.ts --sourcemap --target browser --external '*/aberdeen.js' --outdir dist/ && bun build src/*.ts --minify --sourcemap --target browser --external '*/aberdeen.js' --outdir dist-min/ && npx tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && cd dist-min && ln -s ../dist/*.d.ts .

author: Frank van Viegen
